title: Technical Debt Traceability Map
description: This project is part of my Bachelor's Thesis research, and it is designed to provide a full-stack application for software quality analysis and technical debt traceability. The application leverages quality analysis tools and libraries to help users control and manage software's technical debt.

title: Physio+
description: An android application that helps a physiotherapists' group to organize its centers and manage all services that they offer. Furthermore, a physiotherapist can schedule appointments according to patients' requests and also create patient's registry and log all his sessions. Finally, a patient can request for an appointment and keep track of all of his financial history, session charges etc. This application developed by University of Macedonia pregraduate students in the context of 'Applications Development for Android Devices' course.

title: UniverseCity
description: 'UniverseCity' is a university management system developed as part of a pre-graduate class project. It encompasses essential features for students, faculty and administrative staff. This project demonstrates the ability to collaborate on software development and create practical solutions for educational institutions.
